interface.name: treeland_virtual_output_manager_v1
interface.description: This interface is a manager that allows the creation of copied output.

request.name: create_virtual_output
request.description:
Create virtual output that can be used when setting screen copy mode for use on multiple screens. Virtual outputs are created to mirror multiple wl_output outputs.
The elements of the array outputs are the wl_output corresponding to the screen.
The first element of the array outputs is the screen to be copied, and the subsequent elements are the screens to be mirrored.
The client calling this interface will not generate an additional wl_output object on the client.

arg.name: name
arg.summary: The name of the user readable virtual output

request.name: get_virtual_output_list

description.summary: Gets a list of virtual output names

request.description: Gets a list of virtual output names.

event.name: virtual_output_list

description.summary: Send a list of virtual output names

event.description: Sends a list of virtual output names to the client.

request.name: get_virtual_output
request.description: The client obtains the corresponding treeland_virtual_output_v1 object through the virtual output name.

arg.name: name
arg.summary: The name of the user readable virtual output

interface.name: treeland_virtual_output_v1
interface.description: A treeland_virtual_output_v1 represents a set virtual screen output object.

event.name: outputs
event.description:
This event is sent to the client when any screen in the array changes.
The elements of the array outputs are the wl_output corresponding to the screen.
The first element of the array outputs is the screen to be copied, and the subsequent elements are the screens to be mirrored.
When the primary screen (the screen being copied) is removed, a successor is selected from the queue as the primary screen, and the queue information is updated.

event.name: error
event.description: Send invalid replication output signal to the client.
